awards.title: Yuva Aacharya Award
awards.description: Recognizing exemplary contributors of research and education sector. Organized by Bharat Education Excellence (BEE)

awards.title: Global Teach Award
awards.description: For accomplishing excellence in educational services via occupational competence and exemplary work in the field of education. Organized by AKS Education, New Delhi

awards.title: Jyeshta Aacharya Award
awards.description: For demonstrating excellence in teaching different subjects, shown outstanding contribution to learners and served the community through teaching even outside formal classrooms. Organized by Organized by Bharat Education Excellence (BEE)
